summary: Felt emotionally stable and happy today. Decision to prepare seriously for upcoming SO exams gave clarity and purpose. Enjoyed meaningful conversations with dad, Tanvi, and sister. Stability seems tied to recent job routine, but there’s awareness that it could be temporary. Preparation feels like the core anchor — a deliberate step toward future stability and freedom to pursue personal passions with confidence.

wins: Decided to start Quants prep with clarity of purpose.
ideas: Use preparation as an identity anchor during unstable or low-motivation days.
Track emotional state versus prep consistency to measure true internal grounding.
Prep is not the end — it’s a leverage play to earn long-term freedom to pursue your real passions.

goals: Crack upcoming SO exam through consistent preparation.
Maintain daily study momentum regardless of mood.
Build post-exam runway to explore/build passion projects with reduced pressure.
